params.text: Abokanai
Sunana Simo.
Ina da abokanai guda huɗu.

params.alt: Amagama abo nguZizo, Lele, Sisa kanye no-Ayanda.
params.title: Amagama abo nguZizo, Lele, Sisa kanye no-Ayanda.

params.text: Sunayensu Zizo, Lele, Sisa da Ayanda.

params.alt: Umngani wami uZizo uthanda ukudlala ibhola.
params.title: Umngani wami uZizo uthanda ukudlala ibhola.

params.text: Abokina Zizo yana son wasan buga kwallo.
Shi kuma Lele yana son wasan iyo a rafi.

params.alt: Umngane wami uSisa uthanda ukudlala umacashelana.
params.title: Umngane wami uSisa uthanda ukudlala umacashelana.

params.text: Abokina Sisa na sha'awar wasan buya.
Abokina Ayanda yana sha'awar karanta littafi.

params.alt: Mina? Ngiyathanda ukwenza izinto abathanda ukuzenza.
params.title: Mina? Ngiyathanda ukwenza izinto abathanda ukuzenza.

params.text: Ni kuma a kullum ina sha'awar abubuwan da suke sha'awa.
Ina buga ƙwallo da Zizo.
Ina wasan iyo da Lele.
Ina wasan buya da Sisa.
Ina yin karatu da Ayanda.
Kazo ya kai abokina, me kake so?
Kazo, mu buga ƙwallo tare.
Kazo muyi wasan iyo tare.
Kazo, muyi wasan buya tare.
Kazo muyi karatu tare.
Muna so mu nishaɗantu tare da abokanai.

"Abokanai" credits

This work, "Abokanai", is a derivative of "Friends" by Zimbili Dlamini and Hlengiwe Zondi, used under CC BY. "Abangani" is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.


Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
